ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/0/text:
Step 1: Open the crafting menu by 
interacting with a crafting station.
ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/1/text:
Step 2: Select what you want to 
craft on the left side of the menu.
ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/2/text:
Step 3: Materials, skill level, & time 
required are on the right.
ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/4/text: New recipes can be purchased and discovered in a variety of ways.
ui/tutorials/crafting/steps/5/text: Unlock skill perks to create infused items with special attributes!
